original_title: Popular singer Chamara Weerasinghe admitted to ICU
original_body_lines: Much sought-after Sri Lankan singer Chamara Weerasinghe has been admitted to the Intensive Care Unit (ICU) of the Colombo South Teaching Hospital.
The director of the hospital, Dr. Sagari Kiriwandeniya said that he was admitted to the hospital a few days ago, due to an illness.
